app_descript:
UT Exposure Notifications

Brief:

UT Exposure Notifications is a vital tool designed to assist in the rapid notification of users who may have been exposed to COVID-19. As a tech-based contact tracing solution, it leverages Bluetooth technology to exchange anonymous information with other users, aiming to reduce the spread of the virus within the community by promoting timely isolation and testing.

Given that UT Exposure Notifications is designed to help manage the spread of COVID-19 within communities in Utah, the app does not fit under the gaming category, hence a 'Community' section with social links is not applicable in this case. However, users seeking more information can learn through the provided official state resources.

For more details and FAQs, you may visit their official site.
